description: This course is about techniques and methods I use in sales.In this course I collected tricks and approaches which I learned on my personla experience while saling my product. Do more sales, find new clients, learn client types and avoid sale mistakes after watching this course. This course consist of short lectures on sales,in each lecture I share with you one thing I learned whali doing sales as entrepreneur.Watch lectures in consecutive order or in any order you like. Take this course to save your time to find more clients and avoid beginner mistakes if you are only in the beginning of your sale career.
title: Sales or how to find clients
